name: so-basic-blog-template
title: So Basic - Blog Template
desc: So Basic is perfect for your personal or professional blog. You can focus on writing your content, So Basic will take care of displaying it in a clean, minimal way. Readers will be delighted.
article:
When using So Basic, it's all about you. Your articles, your projects.

Showcase who you are in the Home page with a list of featured articles and projects.

Share your thoughts and your stories through the Blog page.

Get readers to know how awesome you are in the About page.


Pages and components

So Basic includes 4 pre built pages:

  1. Home page
  2. Blog page
  3. Article page
  4. About me page
  5. 404


These pages are built with the following components you can mix and match to create other pages:

  • Blog articles list with pagination
  • Featured articles
  • Projects list
  • Timeline
  • Newsletter sign up form
  • Contacts and social links

Features

  • Lightweight - for stellar page load time
  • SEO optimized
  • Light and dark theme support
  • Fully responsive

Technology

Astro 5.8

Tailwind CSS 4.1

Vanilla JS ð
